Senior Nurse Officer / Nurse Consultant / Study Coordinator National Institutes of Health September 1998  –  March 2011  (12 years 7 months) Retired CDR in the United States Public Health Service. During my early tenure in this position I served as the sole Case Manger and Study Coordinator and while doing so developed the roles for both. In the later years, as the service unit expanded, I operated as the senior Study Coordinator and team lead where I managed ten research studies with 251 active subjects; carried out subject recruitment/scheduling; obtained informed consent; performed data entry and retrieval; oriented and mentored junior staff ; wrote, reviewed & revised protocol and consent documents and submitted reports to the Investigational Review Board as well as other ancillary duties. Senior Assistant Nurse Officer / Research Case Manager National Institutes of Health October 1997  –  September 1998  (1 year) Case manager for adult HIV/AIDS research participants & healthy volunteers who were participating in complex phase I, II and III research protocols.
